comment: Not me searching for new words to say when it's you... but it kind of seems the dictionary is out of words... but I wouldn't mind repeating them endlessly.
name: Aditi Mishra

comment:
Kabhi kabhi serious baate bhi kr liya kr bhai warna teri bkc aur serious baato mai farak batana mushkil ho jaata hai... Selfie King📸... Kaleshi cmmt passer...
Thanks bhai flatmate banne ka puchne ke liye, wahi se puri clg ;life bann gayi
PS :- bhai comma banke pause bhi kyu lena hai continue rakh..
name: Aditya

comment: The guy is so disciplined he'll make the whole flat sleep at 10.  I'm never sure if he means something or if it's just one of his sarcasm attacks. But when he is drunk he is no less than John Cena🥲. It's been so much fun with you these past few years. Hope to meet soon. 🫂
name: Anshika Verma

comment: Nice DP (but bottom angle >>> side angle). The most unserious serious guy of the group, Makes everyone second guess on everything that he says. Your jokes are definitely underrated. I am rooting for you to get into the airforce. Uske baad I've got a job for you 🫡.
name: Dev Daftari

comment: Pani pani pani!! Apne group ka sabse jada determined banda for his goals and I know you'll achieve what you aim for. The favourite core memory for me is same, cracking jokes on table ya kahi bhi aur i wish ki we never loose this match of our humor level ever.
name: Mani

comment: Bro wrote "bit of sarcasm" in sarcasm. Or maybe not. You can never tell. You are one of the most disciplined and determined persons I've ever met. Exams k just pehle history padhane k liye thank you yaar🫂(Although "gulag" vala nahi btaya tha tune👀). Wishing you all the best for your future!!
name: Mitika Bhadada

comment: You are a man of character mere bhai, I still remember the day of the elections jab sab against jaa rha tha , there was pressure surrounding you but the grit you showed really displayed a character that i'll always remember. PS: You have a great analytical mind mere bhai. keep Growing Keep Shining !
name: Sujal Patel

comment: bit sarcasm? are you sure? 🐺 Bhaiii ....tu banda bhot mast h !! jokes bhot lame marta h and bachodi harr batt m...pr kaam ho kuch toh itne hi seriousness se help krta h !! Trips, 204-205 parties ki memories and weird angles se photos !! bhot yaad aayegi , Officer ! I wish the best for you !
name: Ujjwal Hendwe

comment:
Bro was like a big brother, always there for help and support , it was fun cracking jokes and making shayaris with you . Inspiring  person , and a fitness freak .Also a great Goal Keeper 🙌
Baki harami to tu bhi hai bohot bada wala. (Kaleshi cmmt passer) .
Koi tujhe bhi  pool me Suplex mare Amen !
name: Vansh Kathnawal

comment: 3D's define uh One of the most determined dedicated and disciplined persons I have met in IITI....I hope uh remember we had a grp in online sem😂nd d discussions we had were enough to tell how sincere uh were😊Wish uh All the best for your future endeavours🌸 Fly high, will definitely achieve it✈️✈️
name: Nikita Singh

comment: Case Buddy!! From first year till last year apan saath me hi case krte aaye h. Placement ka prep saath me karna along with bkc is unforgettable.
name: Yash Mohan

comment: Best sport secy, jitna tune kaam kiya h shaayd hi kisine kaam kiya hoga, took clg sports council to the heights. classroom aur election ki bkc along with sports council meets were best. All the best broo
name: Rounak Jain

comment: The way you lead or plan is Awesome, you are true definition of 'The Captain'. Thank you and All the Best 🙌.
name: Raghavendra Buchammagari

comment: Class 8th barish vale regional match se lekar IIT k last gc tak ek sath 😂😂,  har match m last quarter m specially gc m savier banne k liye thx mere champion. Phir milenge 🫂
name: Bhom Singh

comment: My dear GS Sports, I wasn't as much associated with sports as I was with others, but I never felt like I should too, big shoutout to ur dedication and passion towards sports. And tbh, none of us could fight with admin as much as you could, really glad to have had you in Gymkhana 🥹✌️✌️
name: K Madhumitha

comment: Optimistic guy spreading positive vibes always finding winner strategies & motivating for wins. It's been fun playing with you thanks for everything and best wishes for your future.
name: Arvind Tomar

comment: We were in a good vibe during the online times. But later we couldn't maintain that touch. I remember you saying about your school days in Thrissur and all. You are one of the calmest guy i have seen. All the best for you brother
name: Abhishek k
